Text:
yes, good idea to upload classical stuff :) i will try to rip my wagner - rachmaninov - liszt collection in not too long.

But, but but but, it IS also a good idea to encode them, either as FLAC, either at least as MP3...

Have mercy people, and quit using that annoying windows media audio format! really! stop it! :-|
oh and of course THX a bunch for the good stuff, Hermanss!
